participant_1.background:
I am an avid reader who enjoys mysteries and loves to relax with a good book on a weekend.
I keep my military life separate from my family life.
I live in the suburbs, but my dream is to live on Mars.
i have a thick full beard.
i have a cat.

participant_2.background:
I am not rich, but I am happy with my life.
i spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I'll probably spend too much time watching YouTube videos of my favorite bands when I'm home.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.

content.text: I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! How's your day going?
It's going great, thanks! I just got back from a trip to the library. I love to read, and I'm always looking for new books to check out.
That's awesome! I love to read too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like. I usually spend my free time volunteering at a nursing home.
That's really great of you! I'm sure the people at the nursing home appreciate your help.
Thanks! I like to think so. I love spending time with the elderly, and I always learn something new from them.
That's really cool. I'm not sure what I'd do with my free time if I didn't have my dog. He's my best friend.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love dogs too. I wish I had one, but I don't have the time to take care of one right now.
I know what you mean. They're a lot of work, but they're so worth it.
Yeah, I'm sure they are. I'll have to get one someday.
You definitely should! They're the best.
No problem! Have a great day!
